DOC.brief_summary: Open-label , randomize , forced-titration clinical trial evaluate efficacy safety TI Inhalation Power combination basal insulin versus insulin aspart combination basal insulin
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluating Technosphere® Insulin Versus Insulin Aspart Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Over 24-week Treatment Period
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 3 clinical trial design examine efficacy safety inhale prandial TI Inhalation Power combination basal insulin versus insulin aspart combination basal insulin subject type 1 diabetes suboptimally control current insulin regimen . This trial employ variety method intensively manage subject .
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Men woman = 18 year age Clinical diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus least 12 month Body mass index ( BMI ) = 38 kg/m2 Stable dose basal/bolus insulin therapy least 3 month FPG consistently < 220 mg/dL : HbA1c = 7.5 % = 10.0 % Fasting Cpeptide = 0.30 pmol/mL Subject willingness use CGM entire course trial Nonsmoking ( include cigarette , cigar , pipe , chew tobacco ) precede 6 month Negative urine cotinine test , define = 100 ng/mL Lung function test : • Forced expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) = 70 % Third National Health Nutrition Examination Survey ( NHANES III ) predict Written inform consent Total daily insulin dose = 2 IU/kg/day . History insulin pump use within 3 month Screening use continuous glucose monitoring within 6 week Screening History inhaled insulin use previous 6 month Two unexplained severe hypoglycemic episode within 3 month Screening episode severe hypoglycemia Visit 1 Visit 2 . Unexplained refers episode severe hypoglycemia relate dose error , lack change meal size , relate additional/unanticipated exercise Any hospitalization emergency room visit due poor diabetic control within 6 month Screening , hospitalization emergency room visit due poor diabetic control Visit 1 Visit 2 Allergy know hypersensitivity insulin drug use study , history hypersensitivity TI Inhalation Powder drug similar chemical structure History recent blood transfusion ( within previous 3 month ) , hemoglobinopathy , condition affect HbA1c measurement . History COPD , asthma , clinically important pulmonary disease ( eg , pulmonary fibrosis ) , use medication condition Any clinically significant radiological finding screen chest xray Active respiratory infection within 30 day Screening ( subject may return 30 day resolution rescreening ) Major organ system disease , include : ? Seizure disorder ; systemic autoimmune collagen vascular disease require previous current treatment systemic corticosteroid , cytotoxic drug , penicillamine ; cancer ( excise cutaneous basal cell carcinoma ) history lung neoplasm Current previous chemotherapy radiation therapy may result pulmonary toxicity ; use medication weight loss ( eg , sibutramine , orlistat ) within 12 week Screening ; treatment amiodarone within 12 week Screening Clinically significant abnormality screen laboratory evaluation chest xray Severe complication diabetes , opinion PI , include symptomatic autonomic neuropathy ; disable peripheral neuropathy ; active proliferative retinopathy ; nephropathy renal failure , renal transplant , dialysis ; nontraumatic amputation due gangrene ; vascular claudication Women pregnant , lactate , plan become pregnant clinical study period ; woman childbearing potential ( define premenopausal surgically sterilize postmenopausal few 2 year ) practice adequate birth control . Adequate birth control define use oral , percutaneous , transdermal contraceptive ; condom diaphragms ( double barrier ) spermicide ; intrauterine device .
